name: Virus Warrior (Rubarion)
description: A simple 2D game where a human is fighting for his life against a bunch of Corona Viruses showering down upon him. He can collect masks and vaccines to enhance his protection against the virus or he can collect soap and sanitizer bottles to blast the viruses out of existence. This game in a simple and fun way, gives an accurate visualization of the gruesome battle against the COVID pandemic that all of us have been waging for more than two years now.
